text: @senatemajldr Your fearless leader president Trump will soon resume indoor rallies, his campaign has implemented a new policy. All attendees cannot sue if they contract the coronavirus at the event.  By the way the coronavirus hasn’t gone away the death toll is 114,000+ and climbing.
